Bike tours Trondheim

Book now

Green sightseeing

Experience the beauty of Trondheim on a bicycle. We offer guided tours around town, on quality bikes and with highly trained guides who know the town in and out. Our tours run daily from April through September. BOOK A TOUR

Testimonials

"This was a great tour. We went at a really good pace. Just the right amount of information and destinations. Highly recommend this to anyone."

-Adam, UK

"We had a great day in Trondheim with our guide Petter, and got to see som pretty interesting places."

-Anna, Sweden

"We visited trondheim las summer, and decided to go on a bike tour with lunch included. Best decision ever! We had a wonderful day."

-Tara, India
